nodes.name: Title Records Agent
nodes.notes: AI Agent - Connect via ai_languageModel, ai_memory, and ai_tool

parameters.name: Firecrawl_Search_Tool
parameters.description: Search recorder's office for deed records and UCC filings. Input: JSON with 'query' and 'property_address'.

parameters.name: Firecrawl_Scrape_Tool
parameters.description: Scrape specific deed or UCC filing documents. Input: JSON with 'url' and optional 'document_type'.
